page.title: 12HOBBIES IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: We asked one hundred people in New Farm Loch eleven questions on hobbies.We found that the most popular hobby was reading. 12% of the people we interviewed were members of competitive teams. One of the people we interviewed never watched television and 38% watched for more than three hours per day. 64% listened to the radio for more than half an hour each day.However we were surprised that only 2% of the people in New Farm go jogging. During the last month 39 people have been to the Dick Institute, which is Kilmarnock's Public Library, and 16 have been to the Kilmarnock Leisure Centre, where you can swim or play badminton or football. If they could afford it, 20% of the people would like to go skiing as their hobby.
